page.title: 15THE WOMENS INSTITUTE
page.content: {...Report on the Womens Institute.. The{function}of the Womens Institute in Norton Lindsey 1985, is to offer {friendship,}to keep the village women in touch & to{introduce}new residents into the community.Membership is 51, one founder member of 80.Meetings 1st. Wed. each month,ex.Aug.,in the village hall at 8 p.m.with variety of speakers & trading stall. { Activities}include an annual party + husbands, selling produce and teas at the Summer Fete,entertaining patients from the Psychiatric Hospital,Hatton, & raising money for charity & village. Some attend County & group events outside village ie.Craft & Cookery demonstrations,Bowls & Darts matches etc.,winning a number of competitions The{Womens Institute}is kept going by the older members as most of the younger ones are working mothers.
